subdisciplines.name: Public Management
subdisciplines.description: The study of the implementation of public policies and the management of public sector organizations.

subdisciplines.name: Policy Analysis
subdisciplines.description: The systematic study of the policy process, including agenda setting, policy formulation, adoption, implementation, evaluation, and change.

subdisciplines.name: Political Economy
subdisciplines.description: The study of the interrelationship between politics and economics as they affect policy choices and outcomes.

subdisciplines.name: Science, Technology and Innovation Policy
subdisciplines.description: The study of policies related to science, technology and innovation, including their development, diffusion, and impact on society and the economy.

subdisciplines.name: Global Governance
subdisciplines.description: The study of the institutions, rules, norms, and processes of global governance and their roles in addressing global challenges.
